trList.name: Super Mario
trList.text:
This is only place in the world where kids and grown-ups alike can return to the wild and play all out with Mario and Donkey Kong! The magic word is 'Play wild!'
Awaken your instinct to play!

trList.name: Harry Potter
trList.text: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ will reproduce the world from the Harry Potter™ stories, bringing it to life on a phenomenal scale at Universal Studios Japan.

trList.name: Minion Park
trList.text: The Minions have finally fulfilled their ambitions! All of humanity will be a part of the mayhem at the Minion Park!

trList.name: Harry Potter Castle
trList.text: Celebrate the four Hogwarts™ houses as they are brought to life in a stunning spectacle of dazzling lights and music. Watch in awe from Hogsmeade™ village as projections are cast against the majestic backdrop of Hogwarts™ castle inside The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™.

trList.name: Jurassic World
trList.text:
Immerse yourself in a jungle where dinosaurs have been brought back to life! Keep your wits about you as these ancient, reptilian beasts roam through the trees.
Welcome...to Jurassic Park.

trList.name: Universal Islands of Adventure
trList.text: Take a ride, multiple rides. Some will drench you. Some will just mess up your hair. Some will make your head spin (figuratively speaking). All of them will say: Every island is a new reality. This is your place to explore all the excitement Universal Orlando Resort has to offer.

trList.name: Universal Volcano Bay
trList.text: Get pumped for your visit to Volcano Bay water theme park at Universal Orlando, where thrills and relaxation flow in perfect harmony. From water slides and winding rivers to a heart-stopping body plunge, experience the rush that is Volcano Bay

trList.name: Forbidden Journey
trList.text: After receiving the honor of the world’s number one ride for five consecutive years, the exhilarating experience that immerses you in the wizarding world has been upgraded! With ultra-realistic images, you can go beyond reality without 3D glasses.
